attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We indigenous English want our Anglo-Saxon English identity reinstating.
We have been culturally and ethnically cleansed ever since 1066.
We want our original culture and identity back, we want re-educating on our own identity and roots, which have been so unjustifiably stripped from us by the ruling classes and British government's past and present.
We deserve an apology from the British government and we deserve help from the authorities in reinstating who we are supposed to be – the Anglo-Saxon English! 
The cleansing we English have endured is unforgivable and needs reversing.
The indigenous English in England's experience, is akin to the cleansing that has happened to the indigenous Australian Aborigines in their homeland.
Our English people need back their confidence, their community spirit, their original Anglo-Saxon unity and common sense which will bring back a positive outlook for our young and will keep families together, it will help combat anti-social behaviour and reinstate respect back into the English community.
A positive Anglo-Saxon English comunal identity installed back into the English, will bring on a much needed positive outlook from all.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
